Enable or disable the [[game tips]] on this device.

== Syntax ==
: <code>gametips <status: Status></code>

== Argument ==
{{argument|be=1|status: Status|enum}}
: Must be one of the following:
:* <code>disable</code> (can be abbreviated as <code>d</code>)
:* <code>enable</code> (can be abbreviated as <code>e</code>)
